column5: Finally managed to get out for a little hard water fishin’!! Spent a few hours fishing a little lake North of town for some whities. Wasn’t disappointed as we got a few for dinner. I was surprised that the lake already had 2 feet of ice on it.  A couple of shots of the lake      The spoils!!    Pre-cooking    Post cooking    Four minutes and eighteen seconds later!!!
Yah hadda trimmed that blood line a bit tighter.. it would have been 4 minutes flat!
Ya 2 feet, but is it good ice.
Ya 2 feet, but is it good ice.  NAH, it's all a funny black colour!!!
I just got hungry from looking at post cooking pic, looks like a great day  I guess the sun's staying pretty low up there, another couple weeks and the days start getting longer
at least another month until we see anything close to 2 feet.  Dinner looks great!
Nice pictures. Thank you for sharing.
WTG Dave!!,two feet here??not likely in our area as you well know.
